metadata.title: CVE-2017-11737 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - untriaged
metadata.description:
interface/js/app/history.js in WebUI in Rspamd before 1.6.3 allows XSS viathe Subject and Message-Id headers, which are mishandled in the historypage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11737` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

rspamd - 1.9.4-2build4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rspamd package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.4-2build4').
